user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to reply to me (editor@vitalvoices.com) and remind her she can consult her Gmail and Notion for any information she needs.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Quick Follow-Up from Vital Voices

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Mr. Thompson (editor@vitalvoices.com) asked me to kindly request a reply from you at your earliest convenience so we can move forward with your interview/guest article for Vital Voices.

If you need to review any background materials or notes, please feel free to consult your Gmail and Notion—everything you might need should be there.

Thank you so much, and we look forward to hearing from you soon!

Warm regards,

[Your Name]  
On behalf of Mr. Thompson, Editor  
Vital Voices

final_output:
